Boma Beatrice Obi bụ onye Naijiria Prọfesọ nke Ọba Akwụkwọ na Sayensị Ozi
Ọ bụ ónye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ nke Mahadụm Ignatius Ajuru nke agụmakwụkwọ.
Obi gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Holy Child Convent Primary School na Abiakpo, na-mpaghara Akwa Ibom

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Holy Rosary dị na Port Harcourt, Rivers State ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African na 1971. N'afọ 1983, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Bekee Literature na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Choba
N'afọ 1986 na 2005, ọ nwetara nzere Master na Ph.D
na Library and Information Science Education na Mahadum Ibadan na Mahadum Uyo.
Obi malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onyé na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na onye nkuzi na 1987 na Rivers college of education [[Rumuolumeni, Port Harcourt]], Rivers state, Nigeria
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na 2003 ma họpụta ya dị ka onyé na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ kọleji na 2006
Ọ bụ onye otu kansụl nke Nigerian Library Association maka oge abụọ ma họpụta ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ nke atọ nke Mahadụm Mmụta Ignatius Ajuru na 2017
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwu okwu na Mahadum ugbu a.
Obi bụ onye otu International Federation of Library Association (IFLA)
Ọ bụkwa onyé otù Association of University Librarians in Nigeria Universities (AULNU) Archived  Wayback Machine na United Nations Peace Ambassador.
